prompt_sent_to_api:
You are a senior clinical geneticist. Your task is to synthesize findings from the provided analytical tool reports into a single, ranked list of potential diagnoses.

Create a master list of all unique disease candidates from all reports. Then, rank them from most to least plausible based on the strength of the evidence (consensus across tools, high scores/ranks).

Your final output must be a numbered list. Each line should contain only the rank, disease name, and OMIM ID. Do not include any reasoning or other text.

**Example Output:**
1. DISEASE NAME 1 (OMIM:XXXXXX)
2. DISEASE NAME 2 (OMIM:YYYYYY)
3. DISEASE NAME 3 (OMIM:ZZZZZZ)

---
INPUT CONTEXT

II. Analytical Tool Reports

PubCaseFinder Report (Phenotype-based):
- oculocerebrofacial syndrome, Kaufman type (Score: 0.866)
- chromosome 1p36 deletion syndrome (Score: 0.858)
- Peters plus syndrome (Score: 0.830)
- intellectual developmental disorder with impaired language and dysmorphic facies (Score: 0.829)
- Coffin-Siris syndrome 1 (Score: 0.828)

Zero-Shot Diagnosis Report (Generative AI-based):
- MOWAT-WILSON SYNDROME; MOWS (Rank: 1)
- PALLISTER W SYNDROME (Rank: 3)
- HYDROCEPHALUS, CONGENITAL, X-LINKED; HYCX (Rank: 5)

GestaltMatcher Report (Facial Dysmorphology-based):
- SNIJDERS BLOK-CAMPEAU SYNDROME; SNIBCPS (Score: 0.508)
- Rubinstein-Taybi syndrome (Score: 0.482)
- KAUFMAN OCULOCEREBROFACIAL SYNDROME; KOS (Score: 0.474)
- Menke-Hennekam syndrome (Score: 0.465)
- CONGENITAL HYPOTONIA, EPILEPSY, DEVELOPMENTAL DELAY, AND DIGITAL ANOMALIES; CHEDDA (Score: 0.462)

Phenotype Similarity Search Report (Vector-based):
- CHROMOSOME 14q11-q22 DELETION SYNDROME (OMIM: 613457, Score: 0.841)
- INTELLECTUAL DEVELOPMENTAL DISORDER WITH HYPOTONIA AND BEHAVIORAL ABNORMALITIES (OMIM: 618748, Score: 0.823)
- NEURODEVELOPMENTAL DISORDER WITH HYPOTONIA AND SPEECH DELAY, WITH OR WITHOUT SEIZURES (OMIM: 620455, Score: 0.818)
- LISSENCEPHALY 9 WITH COMPLEX BRAINSTEM MALFORMATION (OMIM: 618325, Score: 0.818)
- CONGENITAL DISORDER OF GLYCOSYLATION WITH DEFECTIVE FUCOSYLATION 2 (OMIM: 618324, Score: 0.815)

III. Supporting Literature
Web Search Results (Literature/Case Reports):
- Title: Blepharophimosis-Impaired Intellectual Development Syndrome -
  Snippet: The provided article text is incomplete. Please provide the full medical content for me to create a structured summary. If the article is not medically related, I will respond accordingly.
- Title: Cryptorchidism (Concept Id: C0010417)
  Snippet: The provided text is incomplete and does not contain sufficient information to create a structured summary as per the instructions. Please provide the full article text for me to proceed.
- Title: Inguinal hernia (Concept Id: C0019294)
  Snippet: The provided text is incomplete and does not contain sufficient information to create a structured summary as per the instructions. Please provide the full article or additional details for me to proceed.
